original_title: The Naked Brothers Band: Naked Idol
overview: Rosalina comes back after her music cruise, but Michel (the French guy Rosalina kissed on the cruise) also comes back, criticizes Nat's music, and kisses Rosalina which Nat sees. This causes a heated fight between Nat and Rosalina in which they break up and Rosalina quits the band.
title: The Naked Brothers Band: Naked Idol
